description: This table contains information about  e-refill requests.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the order with which the electronic refill is associated.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_RX_NAME
columns.description: This is the prescription name.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_ERX_ID
columns.description: Stores the medication NDC (National Drug Code) which is associated with a medication record.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_RX_QTY
columns.description: The prescription quantity approved.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_RX_UNIT
columns.description: The units associated with the quantity of the refill when the request was approved.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_RX_SIG
columns.description: The signature on the e-refill approval.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_RFL_NUM
columns.description: This column is the number of e-refills approved.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_END_DT
columns.description: The end date for the e-refill prescription.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_PROVIDE
columns.description: This is the provider associated with the e-refill approval.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider record for this row.

columns.name: EREFILL_ENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row.

columns.name: EREFILL_PR_PROV_ID
columns.description: This is the prescribing provider

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_DATE
columns.description: This is the date and time the e-refill was acted  on (approved or refused).

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant that e-refill was approved or refused.

columns.name: EREFILL_APP_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the ID of an General Use Notes record that stores the comments to the support staff.

columns.name: EREFILL_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The e-refill action; examples include "refuse","approve", etc. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Deny


Approve (with Edits) (Old)


Approve


Refuse


Edit


Refill Retracted


Add refills

columns.name: EREFILL_COMP_YN
columns.description:
This column tells whether the e-refill has been completed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


UNKNOWN


YES


NO

columns.name: ERFLL_FOL_UP_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The e-refill authorization request follow-up status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No follow-up


Follow-up pending


Follow-up received


Sending FU Resp

columns.name: ERFLL_FOL_UP_MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of an In Basket message record, which is a message sent to the provider to follow up on an electronic refill request.

columns.name: EREFILL_DENY_REAS_C_NAME
columns.description:
If the refill is refused, the reason will be stored here.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ERFLL_APP_RFL_PRN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the PRN value (for example PRN-2Yr or PRN-1Yr, referring to the length of time the 'as needed' medication can be refilled) approved in the e-refill.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PRN-2Yr


PRN-1Yr


PRN-Other

columns.name: EREFILL_MSG_PHM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of a note record that stores the comments entered in the message to pharmacy field.

columns.name: EREFILL_COS_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider record for this row.

columns.name: ERFLL_PREPRV_INST_X
columns.description: The prescribing provider's ID and the instant at which he acted on the order, separated by a caret. This item is used for indexing.

columns.name: ERFLL_ACTPRV_INST_X
columns.description: The acting provider's ID and the instant at which he acted on the order, separated by a caret. This item is used for indexing.
